thread.title: Von Miller changed his NSFW sack dance after an $11k fine
thread.title_full: Von Miller changed his NSFW sack dance after an $11k fine

author: Nina Mandell
title: Von Miller changed his NSFW sack dance after an $11k fine
text:
Von Miller changed his NSFW sack dance after an $11k fine USA Today Sports 4 hrs ago Nina Mandell © Provided by USA Today Sports (AP Photo/Jack Dempsey) A sack dance deemed NSFW by many broadcasters (including Cooper Manning in this very funny segment below) is going to be saved for times when its worth having a lighter pocket, said Von Miller.
AdChoices
Von Miller on his NSFW dance: "Them pumps are expensive. If I keep pumping, it will get out of control."
— Lindsay Jones (@bylindsayhjones) October 4, 2015
. @Millerlite40 talks his NSFW sack dance and fashion with Cooper Manning in this week's #ManningHour ! https://t.co/P573OoYHOs
— FOX Sports: NFL (@NFLonFOX) October 4, 2015
So less than a week after being fined $11,567 for unsportsmanlike conduct because of the dance, Miller came out for Sunday’s game and was about to do his signature dance, when he cut out the pelvic-thrusting part that was deemed offensive.
Von miller avoids another fine by leaving out the thrusting pic.twitter.com/cSLaF3mxQT
— The Cauldron (@TheCauldron) October 4, 2015
Miller still managed to get the original sack dance out before the game started, according to USA TODAY Sports’ Lindsay H. Jones:
Von Miller put his arms behind his head and gyrated his pelvis in a dance move that is only safe for mature audiences – and that was only in pregame introductions, before the Denver Broncos’ three first-quarter sacks in a 23-20 win against the Minnesota Vikings.
Read more at USATODAY.com/NFL.
Go to MSN Home
